statements.select: with cte_pub_area_v as ( select cast(b.AreaId as varchar(40)) as AreaId,AreaName,ParentId,Levels,orderNo from pub_userarea a inner join pub_area b on a.AreaId = b.AreaId where a.UserId=#UserId# union all select b.AreaId,b.AreaName,b.ParentId,b.Levels,b.orderNo from cte_pub_area_v a join pub_area_V b on a.ParentId = b.AreaId ) select stuff(( select '/'+AreaName from cte_pub_area_v order by Levels,orderNo for xml path('') ),1,1,'')

select 'AAA'+#ParentId#+'-'+ isnull(Substring(cast(cast('9'+Substring(max(cast(AreaId as char(36))),10,4) as int)+1 as char(5)),2,4),'0001') +'-0000-0000-000000000000' as StreeSequence from pub_area Where ParentId=#ParentId#

select Substring(#ParentId#,1,14)+ isnull(Substring(cast(cast('9'+Substring(max(cast(AreaId as char(36))),15,4) as int)+1 as char(5)),2,4),'0001') +'-0000-000000000000' as StreeSequence from pub_area Where ParentId=#ParentId#

with cte_pub_area_v as ( select cast(a.AreaId as varchar(40)) as AreaId,AreaName,ParentId,Levels,orderNo from pub_area_v a where a.AreaId=#AreaId# union all select b.AreaId,b.AreaName,b.ParentId,b.Levels,b.orderNo from cte_pub_area_v a join pub_area_V b on a.ParentId = b.AreaId ) select stuff(( select ''+AreaName from cte_pub_area_v order by Levels,orderNo for xml path('') ),1,0,'') as AreaFullName
